sentences: Esimene autor kirjutab raamatu teise autori poolt alustatud tööd.
context: The word 'kirjutab' is the third-person singular present form of the Estonian verb 'kirjutama', which means 'to write'. It is used to describe what someone (he, she, it) is currently doing in terms of writing - they are actively engaged in the act of writing something. This form indicates that a person (singular, third person) performs the action of writing at this moment or in general.
